publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-378 Jackie Baillie: Closure of the Jeannie Deans Unitâ€”That the Parliament expresses regret at the closure of the Jeannie Deans Unit; recognises the important role that it played in providing nursing care for older people in the Helensburgh and Lomond community, and insists that Argyll and Bute Council and NHS Highland ensure that the provision of alternative local services for older people is fully funded. Supported by: Jamie Stone*, Des McNulty*, Karen Gillon*, David Whitton*
S3M-378 Closure of the Jeannie Deans Unit (lodged on 23 August 2007) Trish Godman*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Annabel Goldie*
